Ryan Wesslen is executive director and principal of NLP & GenAI at Wells Fargo.

An experienced data scientist with 15+ years of experience, Ryan previously served as ML engineer and customer lead at Explosion. At Bank of America, he managed a team of NLP data scientists and held various roles in credit risk analytics and modeling.

Ryan holds a Ph.D. in computing and information systems and master's degrees in economics, financial mathematics, and data science. He has published 20+ articles in human-computer interaction and computational social science with 750+ citations and teaches as an adjunct faculty member at UNC Charlotte's School of Data Science.

:::
